fr.xephi.authme.message.updater

Class MessageUpdater

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.xephi.authme.message.updater.MessageUpdater

  • public class MessageUpdater
extends Object
    Migrates the used messages file to a complete, up-to-date version when necessary.

    • Method Detail

      • migrateAndSave

        public boolean migrateAndSave(File userFile,
                              String localJarPath,
                              String defaultJarPath)
        Applies any necessary migrations to the user's messages file and saves it if it has been modified.
        Parameters:
        userFile - the user's messages file (yml file in the plugin's folder)
        localJarPath - path to the messages file in the JAR for the same language (may not exist)
        defaultJarPath - path to the messages file in the JAR for the default language
        Returns:
        true if the file has been migrated and saved, false if it is up-to-date

      • createConfigurationData

        public static MessageKeyConfigurationData createConfigurationData()
        Constructs the ConfigurationData for exporting a messages file in its entirety.
        Returns:
        the configuration data to export with
